about_the_game:
Devil's wish is a casual game with two game modes: storyline and drama.

You will play the role of supporting role Cao Dan, a blue haired girl who occasionally becomes confused, has an angel's heart and can use ACUPRESSURE KUNG FU. In a world ruled by "talent", you will explore the inner world with the protagonist Liu Lianer.

The main storyline of this work will distinguish between two main branches, but ultimately return to a true ending.

This work mainly features a dark and humorous style, striving to better portray the characters' inner selves.

Regarding the drama mode:

After completing a certain plot, the drama mode will open up to you, allowing you to choose different plays to perform.

In drama mode, you can determine the position and number of enemies, which will result in different dramatic effects.

In drama mode, you can control your character to engage in turn based combat with enemies, and of course, you can also choose to escape.

In drama mode, you can skip at any time, of course, you may miss something, but it won't affect the main storyline.

After completing a play, you will receive items and trigger subplots to harvest some CG.

Personal development, niche game category, obscure and difficult to understand content, slightly awkward gameplay.

No one is allowed to pirate games in any way or publish them on any unauthorized platform.

short_description: This game is a fictional themed casual game that mainly tells the story of two young girls. Players will play as one of the blue haired girls named Cao Dan. After encountering Cao Dan, Liu Lian'er, who had thought she could escape poverty, was caught up in a shocking conspiracy.
